sentence.Network_en: When I asked a question, he answered it fully and articulately.
sentence.Network_cn: 当我提一些问题时, 他都会尽力完整明白地解释给我听.

sentence.Network_en: He argued articulately for his plan.
sentence.Network_cn: 他有力地论证了自己的计划.

auth_sentence.content: Consumers will get better accustomed to the information economy, and they will choose more articulately how they fit into it.
